raw_text:
Embraer Legacy 450/500 and Praetor 500/600 MENUS AND DISPLAYS Pro Line Fusion® Avionics Synoptic – Bleed Air/Anti-Ice Page

APU The APU is depicted as a green circle when the APU is running, and a white APU legend. The APU is white when not in operation. The data block includes both voltage and current.
